byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and J. DAVID GOODMAN

abstract: Images of the prisoner swap began spreading on Tuesday as Israelis celebrated the return of Gilad Shalit and Palestinians welcomed hundreds of freed prisoners home.
snippet: Images of the prisoner swap began spreading on Tuesday as Israelis celebrated the return of Gilad Shalit and Palestinians welcomed hundreds of freed prisoners home.

headline.main: Updates on the Israeli-Palestinian Prisoner Swap
